sect2.title: GreaterThan
sect2.para: Zend_Validate_GreaterThan allows you to validate if a given value is greater than a minimum border value.

note.title: Zend_Validate_GreaterThan supports only number validation
note.para: It should be noted that Zend_Validate_GreaterThan supports only the validation of numbers. Strings or dates can not be validated with this validator.

sect3.title: Supported options for Zend_Validate_GreaterThan
sect3.para: The following options are supported for Zend_Validate_GreaterThan:

listitem.para: min: Sets the minimum allowed value.
